title: She Is the Phoenix
overview: Jiang Leyao, a girl from a humble background, marries into a powerful family, only to be betrayed and brutally tormented by her closest friend and a group of the wealthy and powerful. Her life ends in tragedy until she wakes up back in time. Yet her so-called best friend has also been reborn… And this time, she's stolen Jiang Leyao's place as the bride of high society. But Leyao isn't the only one with secrets. Behind her friend stands a shadowy figure of great power who's been pulling the strings…
